Ilhabela.title: Ilhabela
Ilhabela.byline: Ilhabela is an archipelago and a municipality in the North Coast of São Paulo.

Ilha das Canárias.title: Ilha das Canárias
Ilha das Canárias.byline: Ilha das Canárias is an island in Maranhão, a few kilometers from the main mouth of the river Parnaíba.

Ilha de Mozambique.title: Ilha de Mozambique
Ilha de Mozambique.byline: Ilha de Mozambique (Mozambique Island) is an island in the Nampula Province in Northern Mozambique with a historical heritage that's among the best in Mozambique, and indeed in all of Africa.

Ilha do Caju.title: Ilha do Caju
Ilha do Caju.byline: Ila do Caju is a private nature reserve in Maranhão.

Ilha do Marajó.title: Ilha do Marajó
Ilha do Marajó.byline: Ilha do Marajó is an island at the mouth of the Amazon river, just off Belém in Pará.

Ilha do Mel.title: Ilha do Mel
Ilha do Mel.byline: Ilha do Mel is an hourglass-shaped island just off the coast of Paraná.

Ilha do Mosqueiro.title: Ilha do Mosqueiro
Ilha do Mosqueiro.byline: Ilha do Mosqueiro is an island with a string of beaches just outside Belém.

Ilha Grande.title: Ilha Grande
Ilha Grande.byline: Ilha Grande is a beautiful Brazilian island, about from Rio de Janeiro and  from São Paulo.

Ilhéus.title: Ilhéus
Ilhéus.byline: Ilhéus is a city in Bahia that is approximately 450 km south of state capital Salvador.
